mapper.select: SELECT core_admin.* ,tb_role.`name` as 'role' FROM `core_admin` LEFT JOIN tb_admin_role on tb_admin_role.admin_id=core_admin.id LEFT JOIN tb_role on tb_admin_role.role_id=tb_role.id WHERE core_admin.department LIKE #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_active = 1

SELECT stu_info.id,stu_info.name,stu_info.gender,stu_info.phone, tb_role.name as role FROM stu_info LEFT JOIN tb_admin_role on tb_admin_role.admin_id=stu_info.id LEFT JOIN tb_role on tb_admin_role.role_id=tb_role.id LEFT JOIN user_data_scope on user_data_scope.user_id = stu_info.id WHERE user_data_scope.department LIKE #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
